name: places/ChIJi6fW0If3wokRYPidaMZIozU
adrFormatAddress: 3495 Broadway, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Had a truly excellent experience with my visit to The Dermatology Specialists seeing Patricia Kennedy for my annual skin check. She was thorough, personable and professional. She answered all my questions without rushing. The offices were nice too and the wait time was fairly short. Recommend.

text.text: Had a truly excellent experience with my visit to The Dermatology Specialists seeing Patricia Kennedy for my annual skin check. She was thorough, personable and professional. She answered all my questions without rushing. The offices were nice too and the wait time was fairly short. Recommend.

originalText.text:
Attentive. Thorough. Free samples.
Suggestion: Vacuum/sweep reception/waiting room rug/floor regularly.

Update: 8/17/23
Second visit. Dr. Patricia Kennedy was kind and personable.  She listened attentively to my concerns, then addressed each of them.

originalText.text: Yesterday was my first time going to The Upper Harlem location of The Dermatology Specialists it was so lovely. All the staff were extremely friendly and welcoming. All the staff were patient with me and helpful and everyone was cheerful and helpful and understanding.  Also my pharmacy was sent prescriptions that will hopefully help my two issues. I am looking forward to my next dermatologist appointment will my lovely doctor Diana. I was so happy that the staff noticed me and weren’t grumpy like other places I have been to. The mood was welcoming and I am glad because I was extremely nervous to go because it was a new place.

originalText.text:
My Experience for today with that Dr. SOME DR. JUST ARENT FOR PEOPLE OF COLOR.
CERTAIN people Do Not Care for Black people. This Lady had me Doing her Job. And was afraid to touch me.
It was Not My Favorite Experience. Whoever the original Dr. Was that took care of Me, Is on Maternity Leave  Now. IS THE ONLY Only ONE THAT CAN HANDLE ME moving Forward Sorry. NOT SORRY.

If You Don't care or have any remorse for people's condition You don't Need to be there.

THE ASSISTANT HAVE BEEN PLEASANT AND FRONT DESK Fantastic.

I KNOW how she Made me Feel Unfortunately the assistant was soo uncomfortable she was Like Sorry you felt that way!

As a whole ask the patients Before they leave how was there experience, that's how you get better Credit and review up front. Instead here.

I will Not Be back Until I feel safe around the Proper Physician that is prepared and has No Excuse!

originalText.text: Coming to this location every year for my annual check-up. The service is great, everything is  so easy and smoothly. Doctors are very professional and nice, giving you the best care! Would recommend this clinic for 100%!
